session.description: Trade Session EJB manages all Trading services
Trade JPA Session EJB manages all Trading services
Trade JDBC Session EJB manages all Trading services

query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(q) from Quote q WHERE q.symbol = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(h) from Holding h
SELECT OBJECT(h) FROM Holding h WHERE h.account.profile.userID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(h) FROM Holding h WHERE h.account.accountID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(h) FROM Holding h WHERE h.holdingID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM AccountProfile a
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM AccountProfile a where a.userID = ?1

entity.description: Stock price quotes including current, open, high, low, etc.

query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(q) FROM Quote q
SELECT OBJECT(q) FROM Quote q
SELECT OBJECT(q) FROM Quote q where q.symbol = 's:0'
SELECT OBJECT(q) FROM Quote q WHERE q.symbol LIKE 's:1__' ORDER BY q.change DESC
SELECT q.volume FROM Quote q
SELECT OBJECT(q) FROM Quote q WHERE q.symbol LIKE 's:1__'
SELECT OBJECT(q) FROM Quote q where q.symbol = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(kg) FROM KeyGen kg where kg.keyName = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Account a WHERE a.profile.userID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Account a
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Account a WHERE a.profile.userID = ?1
SELECT o.orderID FROM Orders o WHERE o.orderStatus = 'closed' AND o.account.accountID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Account a where a.accountID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Orders o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Orders o WHERE o.orderStatus = 'closed' AND o.account.profile.userID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Orders o WHERE o.account.profile.userID = ?1 ORDER BY o.orderID DESC
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Orders o WHERE o.orderID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Orders o WHERE o.orderStatus = 'closed' AND o.account.profile.userID = ?1
